Articles.Content:
Hi, i was watching videos of .14 and i saw that if you crash, insted of getting the same crew (jeb bob and bill) you get a random crew.

is there anyway to make it so that there is only jeb bob and bill? 

(don\'t say just dont crash! well, its kinda hard not to crash when ur testing stuff.)
Editing and/or removing persistent.sfs after a crash. Note that even if you don\'t do anything, Buzzkill, Thrillmaster, and Derp will eventually respawn. Not even death can stop them.

> 
> Editing and/or removing persistent.sfs after a crash. Note that even if you don\'t do anything, Buzzkill, Thrillmaster, and Derp will eventually respawn. Not even death can stop them.

And where is that?

also i heard in the full version that you can turn down the level of earth detail? where is that.

> 
> And where is that?
> 
> also i heard in the full version that you can turn down the level of [planet] detail? where is that.

The persistence file is in /KSP/saves/default/
The detail settings are available both in-game, and in the settings.cfg in /KSP/

> 
> The persistence file is in /KSP/saves/default/
> 
> The detail settings are available both in-game, and in the settings.cfg in /KSP/

Once last thing, is the earth level of detail in .14 or .14.1 14.2 ect?

It\'s part of the new terrain system, so 0.14.2 and newer.

...

Wait. Why would you be messing with a version besides 0.13.3 or 0.14.4? :stirpot:

> 
> It\'s part of the new terrain system, so 0.14.2 and newer.
> 
> ...
> 
> Wait. Why would you be messing with a version besides 0.13.3 or 0.14.4? :stirpot:

idk, i was just asking 0\_0
